file_content.text: You promised us this place was impenetrable, Nadien.
A temporary setback, sir. She's a Jedi; she can be reasoned with.
A temporary setback, sir. He's a Jedi; he can be reasoned with.
I know the First Son is here.
Where is the First Son?
We're not at liberty to discuss that.
You were on the recording we took from the Javelin. You negotiated with the First Son.
I've seen your face before.
That was a private communication!
I've lost friends and allies today. Do not test my patience.
I'm not in a reasonable mood.
If you've come to accuse us of "selling Corellia to the Empire", save your breath.
Jedi, please understand. We can all agree these consequences are unfortunate.
But some of us were buying time. The Empire's offer was a chance to save Corellia, and her people.
And then those same people nearly ruin everything by fighting back.
You sold their homeworld to the enemy. What did you expect to happen?
Of course they fought back.
Why can nobody understand? Profit and security against inevitable annihilation. It just makes sense.
The Empire will see you as a liability. I am your only hope.
[Force Persuade] You've lost.
The... Empire will see us as a liability. She is our only hope.
The... Empire will see us as a liability. He is our only hope.
Our only hope.
The Empire will send reinforcements. Our only hope may be lost.
Make your excuses to someone else. Tell me where the First Son is hiding.
I just want the First Son.
And if we refuse, will you torture the information from us?
Don't tempt me.
I don't have to bargain with you. We'll stay right here until the Empire sends reinforcements.
Aha. Reinforcements! Ha! Ahem. Oh, I'm sorry.
You're not all that you appear, are you?
Something's wrong.
Does it shine through this feeble shell?
Don't worry. Even if they send reinforcements, we can get you to safety.
There's no need to panic, sir.
Oh, no, I'm quite safe.
Enough. This is your last chance to tell me where the First Son went.
The First Son's location. Now!
Oh, yes, of course. You seek the Children.
Aaarrrgh!
No! You... you're one of them!
The Emperor's words make everything clear, Jedi. The First Son will prevail, and you will die.
